# Authors and Contributors

TurboLoader is developed and maintained by the contributors listed below.

## Core Team

**Arnav Jain** - Creator and Lead Developer
- Initial design and implementation
- C++ core library (TAR reader, SIMD transforms, lock-free queue)
- Python bindings
- Benchmarking infrastructure
- Documentation

## Contributors

We welcome contributions! If you've contributed to TurboLoader, your name will be added here.

To contribute, see [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).

---

## Acknowledgments

TurboLoader builds upon many excellent open-source projects:

**Libraries:**
- [libjpeg-turbo](https://libjpeg-turbo.org/) - Fast JPEG decoding
- [PyTorch](https://pytorch.org/) - Deep learning framework integration
- [pybind11](https://github.com/pybind/pybind11) - Python/C++ bindings

**Inspiration:**
- [FFCV](https://github.com/libffcv/ffcv) - High-performance data loading
- [NVIDIA DALI](https://github.com/NVIDIA/DALI) - GPU-accelerated data loading
- [WebDataset](https://github.com/webdataset/webdataset) - TAR-based datasets

**Research:**
- Intel AVX/AVX2/AVX-512 documentation
- ARM NEON optimization guides
- Lock-free algorithm papers and implementations

---

## How to Get Listed

Contributions that get you listed as a contributor:

1. **Code contributions** - Bug fixes, features, optimizations
2. **Documentation** - Improvements to docs, examples, guides
3. **Benchmarks** - New benchmarks, performance testing
4. **Bug reports** - High-quality, reproducible bug reports
5. **Community** - Helping others, answering questions

Even small contributions count! See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) to get started.

---

**Thank you to everyone who has contributed to making TurboLoader better!**
